text: Eghtɨ God gavgavim na danightɨ, kɨ an otivir akabar gun mɨgeir gavgavim ikɨva, egh Godɨn nɨghnɨzir mogomebagh fogh, egh fofozir avɨriba bar ikɨva, eghtɨ nan nɨghnɨzir gavgavim bar ekevegh na damutɨ kɨ mɨghsɨaba munamangamin gavgavim ikiam. Eghtɨ kɨ igharaz darazigh ifongeghan koghɨva, kɨ mati pura bizim.
